title: svAmi nIvEDaga
sahitya:
svAmi nIvEDaga koniyADaga mEmandAra iTu vaccitimI


anupallavi

  bhUmina vatarinciri endareendarO mahAnubhAvulu paripUraNulu 
kAmAdi rahitula kaivalya pada gAmulu vArilO varamaina


caraNam    sAma gAna sarvagjnaDaTa sAdhujana kula tilakuDaTa 
kOmala muraLI gAna lOluDaTa rAmakrSNa sangIta sadguru
